mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_sys_role_permission t WHERE t.roleId = #{roleId} AND t.permissionId = #{permissionId} AND t.disabled = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_sys_role_permission t SET t.disabled = 1, t.updateTime = now(), t.updateUser = #{updateUser} WHERE t.roleId = #{roleId} AND t.permissionId = #{permissionId} AND t.disabled = 0
mapper.select: SELECT per.`id` permissionId, rol.`roleId`, per.`name` permissionName, rol.`id`, role.name roleName FROM tb_sys_permission per LEFT JOIN tb_sys_role_permission rol ON per.`id` = rol.`permissionId` AND rol.`disabled` = 0 left join tb_sys_role role on role.id = rol.roleId AND role.disabled = 0 WHERE rol.id = #{id} AND per.disabled = 0
